mapper.select: SELECT i.id as id, COALESCE(i.invoice_amount,0) + COALESCE(i.gst,0) + COALESCE(t.transaction,0) as outstanding FROM invoices AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.invoice_id, sum(COALESCE(t.debit,0) - COALESCE(t.credit,0)) AS transaction FROM transactions AS t WHERE initial_debit=false AND void_flag_char='N' GROUP BY t.invoice_id ) AS t on t.invoice_id = i.id WHERE i.tenant_id=59 AND i.void_flag_char='N'
mapper.update: update invoices set invoice_outstanding = #{outstanding} where id = #{id}
